rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah! Perfect timing!
There's something I want to give you!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0002
rows.name: It's what we got from our first salvage! We really wanted you, Rex and friends, to have it!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't know what it is,
but I'm sure it'll be useful for something!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0004
rows.name:
We decided that the first thing we ever salvaged,
we'd give to you!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0005
rows.name:
It's all thanks to you that we're able to
become salvagers like this.

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0006
rows.name:
We'll keep working hard to repay our debt,
so you can count on us!
